entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Dungeon Defense : The Gate
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫49,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫49,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Feature PackageÔºö‚Ç∫199,99
  • Element PackageÔºö‚Ç∫899,99
  • Automatic PackageÔºö‚Ç∫899,99

Application Description

‚Äª Introduction Defeat all invaders to defend your dungeon! Collect more weapons and monsters to make them stronger. Enjoy various contents such as "dungeon building, collect various weapons, achievements" ‚Äª Story In order to defend the last remaining dungeon of this world, you became a guardian. Heroes from all over the world gather to conquer the dungeon. Never be defeated, be the best dungeon! ‚Äª Characteristics of game ‚óà Enjoy "Retro graphics & Sounds". ‚óà Easy to play, anyone can enjoy it easily. ‚óà Please enjoy the pleasure by sweeping away enemies. ‚óà Organize a variety of mercenaries and find synergies. ‚óà Rewards are waiting for each achievement. I am a solo developer. Your download and feedback is so precious to me. If you have fun, please recommend it to the people around you. -SUPPORT- E-Mail : support@gamecoaster.com Tel :+82 10-4178-0283 @ GameCoaster * In-app Payment lets you use features or characters immediately. However, you can enjoy all of the content without IAP. :)

entry.title: DungeonSquad
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Season PassÔºö‚Ç∫399,99
  • Nurse PackÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • AutonomyÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • Mecha PackÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Time FlowÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • Unlock BeholderÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • Unlock GumihoÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • Season 3 Battle PassÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Uniform PackÔºö‚Ç∫199,99
  • Unlock BaphometÔºö‚Ç∫149,99

Application Description

The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense! A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss. Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory. Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss. You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own. You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you, armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices. Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Dark Gods, and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies. ‚óá 10 elite monsters and over 100 unique skills ‚óá The Power of the Abyss gets stronger as you rebuild ‚óá Roguelike with random choices and opportunities

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Cat TodoÔºöAI & Tasks & Reminder
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫19,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫19,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • 2025 Forest ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • 2025 Lawn ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫79,99
  • 2025 Flower ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • Lawn ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • TobyÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • GizmoÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • LuckyÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • LokiÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • Civet ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • Tuxedo ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫49,99

Application Description

CatBox Todo is a to-do app loved by cat lovers worldwide. It's a brand-new, minimalist to-do list application featuring lively and adorable cats and themes. Design Concept CatBox aims to provide users with a comfortable experience by having lively kittens accompany them. The cats will perform various daily actions and provide touch feedback, encouraging users like little helpers. The to-do design emphasizes a realistic portrayal of daily life with an ultra-minimalist design, focusing on core functionality and minimizing distractions. Features ‚Ä¢ Lively Cat Companionship: Cats will vividly accompany you throughout your day, not only encouraging you when you complete tasks but also showcasing fun moments like eating and sleeping, just like your friends. ‚Ä¢ Clear and Concise To-Dos: Use CatBox Todo to record important matters simply and directly. ‚Ä¢ Quadrant View for Better Focus: Prioritize and focus on important tasks with the four-quadrant view. ‚Ä¢ Widget Support with Thematic Changes: CatBox Todo supports the latest widgets and will change along with the chosen theme. ‚Ä¢ Adorable Cat Skins: Lively and adorable cat skins are available through subscriptions and individual purchases. ‚Ä¢ iOS 26 Adaptability: Utilizes Apple Intelligence for iOS 26 compatibility. ‚Ä¢ Apple Intelligence runs entirely on-device, delivering enhanced cat AI while maximizing privacy. Privacy Policy and Terms of Use https://nicolecat.cn/cat/privacy.html https://nicolecat.cn/cat/terms.html Contact Us If you're having fun, please feel free to contact us: support@nicolecat.com

entry.title: Strongbox Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫6.999,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫4.999,99 [‚Ç∫2.999,99 ~ ‚Ç∫6.999,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫4.999,99

In-App Purchases

  • Annual TipÔºö‚Ç∫239,99
  • Monthly TipÔºö‚Ç∫35,99
  • Huge TipÔºö‚Ç∫9.999,99
  • Large TipÔºö‚Ç∫4.999,99
  • Medium TipÔºö‚Ç∫999,99
  • Small TipÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • Little TipÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

Strongbox Pro is available here for outright and upfront purchase instead of via an In-App Purchase upgrade. This version of Strongbox is identical to the much loved Strongbox application with all the Pro features and the same regular update schedule. Strongbox is an application for keeping all your passwords safely stored and protected by one master password. Supporting the open source Password Safe and KeePass formats. *** Supports Family Sharing *** *** Features *** - Face ID/Touch ID Unlock for the ultimate in convenience, security and speed. - PIN Code Unlock with a Duress PIN option for those tricky situations. - Passkey support - The latest, most convenient and most secure authentication method (passkeys). - YubiKey protection - secure your databases with a hardware token. - Secure - protected by time tested military grade cryptography. - Private - Isolated In-App attachments viewer for your sensitive documents, photos & videos. - Audit your passwords - Automatically check your database for weak passwords including a 'Have I Been Pwned?' check. - Cloud Support, so you can access your cloud safes using iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV or SFTP even when offline. Use the built in Files app for many other storage options or store them securely only on your local device. You choose your storage. - Search your entire set of passwords and secrets instantly and powerfully, with deep search. Autocomplete new entries, and auto generate secure passwords. - Compatible - Import/Export by Files app, Email, CSV, iTunes File Sharing or use cloud storage. - Standards compliant - using the time tested Password Safe and KeePass formats so you can import any existing password safe you have. - Features galore - Incredibly configurable password generation including Diceware (XKCD) & regular passwords. - Timed Auto Clear Clipboard. - Entry History. - KeePass Field References, Tags, Custom Icon & FavIcons (including automatic search & download). - Two Factor Authentication codes (TOTP) - QR Code, Steam & Manual. --------------------------------------------------------------------- ‚Ä¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase ‚Ä¢ Strongbox Privacy Policy may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/privacy-policy/ ‚Ä¢ Strongbox Terms of Use may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/terms/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DayCost Pro - Personal Finance
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫149,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫149,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Three seconds a bill. Fast, Security and Easy to use is our aim, and iOS notification center widget. Look at other people how to say: ‚óé I just downloaded this app and I am so loving it already! It seems easy to use but I need to explore it more. ‚óé Very innovative work. Keep up guys. 5 star app. ‚óé It's quick to note down your expenses and helps you track your money. ‚óé Polished, smart, simple, with all functions of apps of this kind. Exactly the one I was looking for. Makes me delete other similar apps on my phone and keep only this one, really. ‚óé I love this app! It is clean, beautiful, very customizable, and user-friendly. I love the ability to make your own categories and accounts. And I also love the ability to put it in your pull-down Notification Center on your phone. It makes it quickly accessible during the day. Great job, love the app! Apple Watch: You can create incomes and expenses from your Apple Watch. The Glance shows your expenses of today, this month. FeatureÔºö ‚óé Three seconds only: pull down, fill money, choose category ‚óé iOS notification center widget: you can easily account when iPhone lock screen ‚óé Passcode security: everyone cannot open, only you. even double-click the Home button, in the App list can not view the data ‚óé Support more than 160 kinds of currency, conversion exchange rate automatic updates ‚óé Calculator: built-in calculator, more convenient and faster ‚óé Full gestures: fast billing basic ‚óé Humane beginners guide: for special operations, we guide the way through the animation + text, more intuitive, easier to understand ‚óé iCloud backup & restore ‚óé Dropbox backup & restore ‚óé Export data to CSV via Email ‚óé Recurring event, both expenses and incomes, with rich frequency options. ‚óé Allow custom theme color and wallpaper. ‚óé Allow add transaction from template. BasicÔºö ‚óé Expense & Income bills can be added photos ‚óé Income, Expense, Transfer, the others have ‚óé Graphical reports, allowing you to easily view the balance of payments situation year / month / week ‚óé Budget management: give yourself a reason to control consumption ‚óé A variety of color themes and wallpaper, allows you to fully personalize ‚óé Custom categories and consumption expenditure accounts, more in line with your needs ‚óé Supports iPhone & iPad ‚óé Daily reminder IncreaseÔºö ‚óé Easy copy history through gestures and automatically positioned in the day consumption date, you only need to modify the money can be. of course, you can use the existing money saved directly ‚óé You can also add categories and account when billing editing, click on the banner to change currency If you give up because of difficulties If you give up because of busy If you want to know where expenses If you want to save money If „ÄÇ„ÄÇ„ÄÇ Try our "DayCost" it, she will be your best assistant URL Schemes: DayCost:// Help translate DayCost: Contribute to the DayCost translation in your language. Let's make DayCost available to everyone in the world! We will show translator's info in DayCost, if you so desire. In addition, we also give several redemption code as a gift. have any suggestions or comments, please write to usÔºösupport@daycost.com

entry.title: Cultist Simulator
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫399,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫399,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Forbidden BundleÔºö‚Ç∫399,99
  • The DancerÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The GhoulÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The PriestÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The ExileÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we‚Äôre bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. ‚Ä¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesn‚Äôt hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you‚Äôll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. ‚Ä¢ Intense, immersive narrative ‚Äì Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novel‚Äôs worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. ‚Ä¢ A rich Lovecraftian world ‚Äì Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft‚Äôs tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... ‚Ä¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal ‚Ä¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened ‚Ä¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit ‚Ä¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on ‚ÄúContact us‚Äù at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫149,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫49,99 [‚Ç∫19,99 ~ ‚Ç∫149,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫49,99

Application Description

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: This Is the Police 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫54,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫5,00 [‚Ç∫5,00 ~ ‚Ç∫54,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫5,00

Application Description

IMPORTANT DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff‚Äôs department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions ‚Äì and try to keep out of prison yourself! ‚Äì in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat. Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It‚Äôs all of these, and more! Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience. Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn‚Äôt spiral out of control. Take charge of the Sheriff‚Äôs department. Your subordinates aren‚Äôt just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices ‚Äì and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You‚Äôll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department. Engage in tactical combat. During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment ‚Äì if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn‚Äôt have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life. Become a true detective. Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought. Thank you for playing ‚ÄòTHIS IS THE POLICE 2‚Äô! Get in touch with HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com Join us on Facebook: HandyGames Subscribe to our YouTube channel: HandyGames Check news on Twitter: @handy_games Follow us on Instagram: handygames Imprint: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/ ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Are you ready, kids? Play as SpongeBob, Patrick, and Sandy and show the evil Plankton that crime pays even less than Mr. Krabs. Want to save Bikini Bottom from lots of rampant robots with your mighty bubbles? Of course, you do! Want to underpants bungee jump? Why wouldn't you! The battle is on! Features: - Play as SpongeBob, Patrick, and Sandy and use their unique sets of skills - Thwart Plankton's evil plan to rule Bikini Bottom with his army of wacky robots - Meet countless characters from the beloved series - Faithful remake of one of the best SpongeBob games ever created - High-end visuals, modern resolutions, and carefully polished gameplay - Game Center support Thank you for playing SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom! Get in touch with HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com Join us on Facebook: HandyGames Subscribe to our YouTube channel: HandyGames Check news on Twitter: @handy_games Follow us on Instagram: handygames Imprint: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/ ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫49,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you‚Äôre a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more! Key Features: Baseball Action Like Never Before: Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter‚Äôs box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun! Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay: Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops! Collectible Doodle Characters: Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments. Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun: Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action! Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound: Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run. Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure. Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

  • 100k chipsÔºö‚Ç∫149,99

Application Description

Bluff and raise, improve your skills, gain experience, make new friends and become the best poker player ever! ‚óÜ Game features ‚óÜ ‚Ä¢ FREE CHIPS ‚Äì Play the game every day to get free chips! ‚Ä¢ BOOST POKER TOURNAMENT ‚Äì A Texas Hold'em tournament where you spin the reel for a chance of winning 15 billion chips! Boost your balance with this incredibly exciting game! ‚Ä¢ SPECIAL MODES ‚Äì Play Texas Hold'em with a twist: make super combinations with jokers, peek at your opponent's cards, play high cards only, get pocket pairs and much more! ‚Ä¢ MTT TOURNAMENTS ‚Äì The most popular offline tournaments are now available online! Defeat lots of worthy competitors at several tables to reach the final table! ‚Ä¢ TOURNAMENTS¬†‚Äì Participate in weekly Sit'n'Go tournaments, where you can WIN unique trophies or millions of chips and top our Leaderboard! ‚Ä¢ CASINO GAMES ‚Äì Enjoy a variety of casino games. Play blackjack, Omaha poker, roulette, baccarat, slots, video poker, craps, Split Bet Poker and Set Poker‚Äîall in one application! ‚Ä¢ VIP LEVELS ‚Äì Get huge bonuses and exclusive access to the latest in-game features! ‚Ä¢ FAIR PLAY GUARANTEED¬†‚Äì All our games use a Random Number Generator (RNG) and are certified by independent experts. We guarantee the best and fairest Texas Hold'em experience! ‚Ä¢ CHAT WITH OTHER PLAYERS¬†‚Äì Have even more fun at the casino tables with our convenient in-game chat, instant messenger and animated emoji. Discuss the hands played or share your emotions with your poker opponents and friends! ‚Ä¢ REFERRAL SYSTEM ‚Äì Invite your friends to play, everyone will get a reward! ‚Ä¢ BUILD YOUR PROFILE ‚Äì Share your successes with friends. Show off how many games you've played, your biggest wins, level, card collections, achievements, property and trophies! ‚Ä¢ UNIQUE AVATAR ‚Äì Create a one-of-a-kind look in the avatar editor. ‚Ä¢ QUESTS ‚Äì Complete daily quests to get free chips! ‚Ä¢ EASY LEARN TO PLAY ‚Äì Are you new to Texas Hold'em poker but always wanted to try it? Our simple-to-follow tutorial mode will help you take the first steps. ‚Ä¢ NO REGISTRATION¬†‚Äì Get straight into the action. Choose guest mode to use our free casino app without registering. ‚Ä¢ SINGLE ACCOUNT¬†‚Äì Play on different devices. Choose the authorization method that works best for you and start playing Texas Hold'em poker right away for free! Subscribe to our social media pages and be the first to find out about our promotions and latest news! Facebook: https://facebook.com/Pokerist Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pokeristclub YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/KamaGamesChannel X: https://x.com/KamaCasino This game is only available to users of legal age. The game offers no possibility of winning money or anything of value. Success in playing this game does not imply your success in a similar real-money casino game.

entry.title: RAW Power
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫699,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫249,99 [‚Ç∫249,99 ~ ‚Ç∫699,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

OVERVIEW ‚Äî ADVANCED RAW: Unlock the power of Apple's RAW engine with easy-to-use controls. Develop images with the same outstanding RAW processing in Apple‚Äôs Aperture professional photo app. Unique adjustments let you improve your images in ways that can't be done in any other app. ‚Äî ORGANIZE: RAW Power is a complete photo app to organize and manage your photo library. Fully compatible with iCloud Photo Library, so all changes are synced. Every image and every change is available to every app on your iPhone or iPad. ‚Äî RATE & FILTER: Filter albums by file type, rating, flag, and edit state. Ratings and Flags sync over iCloud Photo Library! ‚Äî FILES.APP: Store images in the Photos library or Files.app. Use our new Share extension to import from other apps directly into RAW Power‚Äôs Files container. Same non-destructive editing, rating, and filtering features! (iCloud syncing is not supported). ‚Äî NOT JUST RAWs: RAW Power is great with JPEGs, with many tools missing from the Photos app. Plus an innovative Depth Effect for photos shot on iPhones with a dual camera system. ‚Äî EDIT CROSS-PLATFORM: Edit on iOS and continue on the Mac (or vice-versa) using RAW Power 3 for macOS.‚Ä® ‚Äî BATCH PROCESSING: Apply presets, paste adjustments, and export multiple images. Export to the photo library or to Files.app. Using iOS 16 or later? You may be interested in Nitro Photo. It includes masking, XMP support, synchronized Pan and Zoom and many other features. Search for 'Nitro Photo' on the App Store. ORGANIZATION AND DISPLAY ‚Äî Zoom up to 800% for extremely precise adjustments. ‚Äî Create and rename albums, delete images from albums and the library, and move images into albums. Full access to your folder hierarchy. ‚Äî Display file name, exposure information, flash status, and location with a map. REAL-TIME EDITING ‚Äî Full non-destructive editing. All changes stored in the iOS Photo Library and iCloud Photo Library, so you can edit on one device and continue on another, without loss of quality. Even between Mac and iOS! ‚Äî Optimized for small screens. Choose which adjustments to show by default and in what order ‚Äî Unparalleled highlight recovery with Boost and Recovery sliders. Real-time control of Apple's RAW engine, including Noise Reduction, Black Point, Gamut Mapping and more ‚Äî Auto Enhance, Auto White Balance, Auto Levels and Auto Curves. Apply them to multiple images at once! ‚Äî Apply presets, and Copy / Paste Adjustments to one image or many ‚Äî Histogram with Clipping Indicators and Hot Pixels Overlay ‚Äî LUTs (Look up tables) with built-in looks and film simulations. Add your own! ‚Äî Crop and Straighten, Rotate and Flip, White Balance with sampler and auto ‚Äî Highlights, Shadows, Vibrancy, Local Contrast and incredible Lighten and Darken sliders ‚Äî Curves and Levels. Curves has Linear and Lab modes, and samplers ‚Äî Depth Effect to enhance photos shot with the dual camera system ‚Äî Chromatic Aberration to correct lens artifacts, Perspective, Black & White, Vignette with a controllable center point ‚Äî All sliders are real-time and GPU accelerated ‚Äî High-precision, deep color imaging engine ‚Äî Export JPEG, PNG, and TIFFs (8- and 16-bit) to Files.app or Photos.app COMPATIBILITY ‚Äî Compatible with hundreds of cameras, including iPhone RAW images. (EXTENDED SUPPORT REQUIRES iOS 14. Full List at https://www.gentlemencoders.com/extended-raw/index.html) RAW support is downloaded in the background by Apple. Your device must be on WiFi and plugged in to get updates. ‚Äî Great with JPEGs, TIFFs, PNGs, and most DNGs ‚Äî Video Tutorials (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7l78rOzFxaHG-e5AT-MGWQ) RAW POWER for MAC RAW Power is also available on the Mac App Store as a Photos Extension and standalone app with Photos Library support. Rated 4.5 stars worldwide! ABOUT GENTLEMEN CODERS Gentlemen Coders was founded by a former Senior Director of Engineering at Apple. For more information, visit www.gentlemencoders.com.
